entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:31 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 7:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -37.3°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:35 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:35 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 5:35 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
